scripts.start:
echo '====================================================================
Executing "npm run watch-docs-content" in the project root,
you get automatic content generation based on xmlui metadata!
====================================================================
' && xmlui start
scripts.build:docs: npm run gen:releases && npm run gen:download-latest-xmlui-release && npm run gen:rss && xmlui build --buildMode=INLINE_ALL --withMock
scripts.build-optimized: npm run gen:releases && npm run gen:download-latest-xmlui-release && npm run gen:rss && npx xmlui-optimizer
